physDesc.p: Fragments 1-15 (in mm), (1) 31 x 60, (A) 3 lines, left top margins, (B) 3 lines, left margin, (2) 62 x 27, (A) 6 lines, left margin, (B) traces, (3) 70 x 25, (A) 8 lines, left margin, (B) traces, (4) 64 x 19, (A) 8 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (5) 70 x 22, (A) 70 x 22, (A) 7 lines, no margins, (B) 8 lines, left margin (?), (6) 43 x 12, (A) 5 lines, no margins, (B) (?), (7) 22 x 32, (A) 3 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (8) 49 x 29, (A) 5 lines, no margins, (B) 5 lines, no margins, (9) 43 x 27, (A) 5 lines, no margins, (B) 6 lines, no margins, (10) 43 x 24, (A) 3 lines, no margins, (B) 5 lines, no margins, (11) 47 x 24, (A) 6 lines, no margins, (B) 3 lines, right margin, (12) 44 x 124, (A) 4 lines (?), left margin, (B) blank, (13) 50 x 61, (A) 2 lines, bottom margin, (B) 5 lines, no margins, (14) 40 x 25, (A) 6 lines, no margins, (B) 4 lines, no margins, (15) 48 x 12, (A) 5 lines, no margins, (B) blank
